 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.googlecode.aluminumproject.libraries.core.actions

Interface Summary
LoopInformation Provides information about a loop in a looping action.
 

Class Summary
Block Stores its body (a block), so that it can be used later (by the block contents action).
BlockContents Invokes a named body that was stored by a block action.
Convert Converts a value and saves the converted value in a variable.
Convert.ConvertFactory Creates convert actions.
Each Iterates over an iterable, invoking its body for each element.
If Executes an action if the value of its parameter is true.
Include Includes a template.
Include.IncludeFactory Creates include actions.
IncludeLocal Includes a part of a template that was saved earlier.
RemoveVariable Removes a variable from the context.
Repeat Invokes its body a number of times.
Scope Adds a scope to the context, executes its body, and removes the scope from the context.
SetVariable Sets a variable in the context.
Template An action that serves as a container for other actions.
Unless Executes an action, unless the value of its parameter is true.
Write Writes a value to the writer.
